PARAM.help: Home Agent lifetime in seconds (0 to track ra-lifetime)

PARAM.help: Set IPv6 Max Router Advertisement Interval

PARAM.name: ra-interval-sec

PARAM.help: Lifetime associated with the default router

PARAM.help: Router lifetime in seconds (0 stands for a non-default gw)

PARAM.name: reachable-time
PARAM.help: Duration for neighbor to be reachable after receiving reachability confirmation

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to suppress sending router advertisement messages. By default, sending router advertisement messages are suppressed.

COMMAND.name: show ipv6 neighbors

PARAM.name: vrf
PARAM.help: Display NDP entries of the given VRF

PARAM.name: vrfname
PARAM.help: Display NDP entries of the given VRF

PARAM.name: vrfname
PARAM.help: Display NDP entries of the given VRF

PARAM.name: mgmt
PARAM.help: Display NDP entries of the management VRF

PARAM.name: all
PARAM.help: Display ARP entries from all VRFs
NDP entry for this IPv6 address
PARAM.name: ip-addr

COMMAND.ACTION: python3 $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-neighbors.py rpc_oc_get_neighbors family:IPv6 ip:${ip-addr} mac:${mac-addr} vrf:${vrfname} summary:${summary}

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: This command displays NDP table entries. To filter the output, specify an interface, port channel, or VLAN, an IPv6 address, a MAC address, or a combination of more than one value to match. You can also display total number of ARP entries using 'summary' option.
DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# show ipv6 neighbors [interface { Ethernet < port > [summary] | PortChannel < id > [summary] | Vlan < id > [summary] }] [< ipv6-address >] [mac-address < mac >] [summary]

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: This command displays NDP ra-interfaces.
DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# show ipv6 nd ra-interfaces
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# do show ipv6 nd ra-interfaces | no-more Interfaces: Vlan100 ND advertised reachable time is 0 milliseconds ND advertised retransmit interval is 0 milliseconds ND advertised hop-count limit is 64 hops ND router advertisements sent: 0 rcvd: 0 ND router advertisements are sent every 600 seconds ND router advertisements lifetime tracks ra-interval ND router advertisement default router preference is MEDIUM Hosts use stateless autoconfig for addresses. ND router advertisements with Adv. Interval option. Advertised Link MTU is 1200 rdnss 2001::1 1234 rdnss 2002::1 infinite rdnss 2003::1 dnssl mybroadcom1 1234 dnssl mybroadcom2 dnssl mybroadcom3 infinite prefix 2001::1/128 5000 4000 prefix 2002::1/128 no-autoconfig off-link

COMMAND.name: show ipv6 neighbors interface

COMMAND.help: Clear NDP entries for this interface
COMMAND.name: clear ipv6 neighbors interface
COMMAND.ACTION: python3 $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-neighbors.py rpc_sonic_clear_neighbors family:IPv6 intf:${interface-switch} phyIf:${phy-if-name} subIf:${subif-name} mgmtIf:eth0 vlanIf:${vlan-if-name} poIf:${po-if-name}

PARAM.name: ip-addr
PARAM.help: IP address for which NDP record needs to be deleted

PARAM.name: vrf
PARAM.help: Clear NDP entries of the given VRF

PARAM.name: vrfname
PARAM.help: Clear NDP entries of the given VRF

PARAM.name: vrfname
PARAM.help: Clear NDP entries of the given VRF

PARAM.name: mgmt
PARAM.help: Clear NDP entries of the management VRF

PARAM.name: all
PARAM.help: Clear NDP entries from all VRFs

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: To delete dynamically learned IPv6 entries from the NDP table, use the 'clear ipv6 neighbor' command. To specify the entries to be deleted, enter an interface, port channel, or VLAN, an IPv6 address, or a combination to match. Use the 'show ipv6 neighbors' to verify that the IPv6 entries have been deleted.
DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# clear ipv6 neighbors [interface {Ethernet < port-number >| PortChannel < number >| Vlan < vlan-id >| Management < port-number >}] [< ipv6-address >]

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: This command clears/resets statistical information on RA enabled interface(s).
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to clear statistical information on RA enabled interface(s).

EXAMPLE.summary: Below commands clear sessions on Ethernt64

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# clear ipv6 nd ra-interfaces Ethernet64

PARAM.name: expire
PARAM.help: Set IPv6 ND cache entry expiry time

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures time in seconds for IPv6 ND cache entry to expire.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure IPv6 ND cache entry timeout.

PARAM.name: expire
PARAM.help: Unset IPv6 ND cache entry expiry time

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures IPv6 ND cache entry expiry time and sets it to Default Value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to Unconfigure IPv6 ND cache entry timeout.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# no ipv6 nd cache expire

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Enables sonic version of router advertisement daemon inside radv docker.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to enable sonic version of router advertisement daemon inside radv docker.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Disables sonic version of router advertisement daemon inside radv docker.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to disable sonic version of router advertisement daemon inside radv docker.
